Home
===================================== 

Row
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


### Confirmed

```{r}
valueBox(comma(sum(m$Confirmed)), caption = "Total Confirmed", icon = "fa-check fa-sm", 
         color="#222")
```

### Active

```{r}
valueBox(comma(sum(m$Confirmed) - sum(m$Recovered) - sum(m$Deaths)), 
         caption = "Active Cases", icon = "fa-procedures fa-sm", 
         color="#222")
```

### Recovered

```{r}
valueBox(comma(sum(m$Recovered)), caption = "Total Recovered", icon = "fa-heart fa-sm", 
         color="#222")
```

### Deaths

```{r}
valueBox(comma(sum(m$Deaths)), caption = "Total Deaths", icon = "fa-skull fa-sm", 
         color="#222")
```

### Countries

```{r}
valueBox(nrow(m), caption = "Countries Affected", icon = "fa-flag fa-sm", 
         color="#222")
```
